comment._content: The attribution of Polhemus & Coffin being responsible for landscaping on this property is quite odd as both of the partners were attending high school in 1910. I wonder if the correct attribution is Marian Coffin (of no relation), a prolific and popular landscape artist whose work can be dated to correlate with 1910.

comment._content: Polhemus & Coffin: Thank you!   It was definitely meant to be Marian Cruger Coffin, and the correct name is now in the description.
